snippet: The superintendent of the building where an artist had lived and worked pleaded guilty to stealing her paintings but would not reveal their whereabouts.
abstract: Mihaly Kovacsevics is sentenced to three to nine years in prison for stealing hundreds of paintings from the stored belongings of artist Shirley Almeda West, deceased resident of TriBeCa apartment building in which Kovacsevics was the superintendent.
lead_paragraph: The superintendent of the building where an artist had lived and worked pleaded guilty to stealing her paintings but would not reveal their whereabouts.

headline.seo: TriBeCa Super Who Stole Paintings Stays Silent at His Sentencing
headline.main: Sentenced for Stealing Art, Man Won’t Say Where It Is
headline.print_headline: Sentenced for Stealing Art, Man Won’t Say Where It Is
